items.sentence: I haven\'t been able to get enough sleep lately.
I\'m worried about what\'ll happen if Tom comes.
Tom was sitting on the floor playing his bongos.
I didn\'t quite catch the name of that designer.
Tom dropped by Mary\'s home every day for lunch.
How much is Tom going to be paid for doing that?
How much money do you think Tom has in the bank?
How much money do you think that Tom has stolen?
We can go back home if you two want to be alone.
Why don\'t you believe me when I say I\'m happy?
